trends: There have been no other sightings in Matthews
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsThere were blue, green and white lights, they kept moving around and seemed to follow him a bit till he got to the next town, plan on being in the area tomorrow night. I went out from my home and could see some lights moving that are not starts since I have lived in my home and know what stars are supposed to be where and we also know what flies in the skies in our area, life copters and all of that. This was seen by my oldest son who is now a believer, he called me a bit excited about what he saw and he is 18 and knows when "something" is different and would not call me about UFO's for no reason or even as a joke. I must say I am jealous!!!
